statements: SELECT * FROM survey_responses
SELECT response_id, response_value FROM survey_responses
SELECT user_id, response_value FROM survey_responses ORDER BY user_id DESC
SELECT AVG(response_value) FROM survey_responses
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 1
SELECT response_id, user_id, response_value FROM survey_responses WHERE question_id = 1 ORDER BY response_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 100 AND question_id IN (1, 2) ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT question_id, AVG(response_value) AS average_response FROM survey_responses GROUP BY question_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY average_response DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE response_value BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY user_id;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS num_responses, AVG(response_value) AS average_value FROM survey_responses GROUP BY question_id HAVING num_responses > 10 ORDER BY average_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses;
SELECT survey_id, response_value FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 123;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_id = 456;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_value > 5 ORDER BY survey_id ASC;
SELECT survey_id, question_id, response_value FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 789 ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE survey_id = 1 ORDER BY question_id DESC, response_value ASC;
SELECT question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT AVG(response_value) AS avg_response_value FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id;
SELECT survey_id, MAX(response_value) AS max_response_value FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY survey_id HAVING MAX(response_value) > 5;
SELECT survey_id, SUM(response_value) AS total_response_value FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_id IN (1, 2) GROUP BY survey_id ORDER BY total_response_value DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE question_id = 2;
SELECT answer_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id = 5;
SELECT question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_id = 3;
SELECT average_score FROM QuestionScores WHERE question_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT answer_text, question_text FROM SurveyResponses JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyResponses.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id;
SELECT question_id, AVG(average_score) AS avg_score FROM SurveyQuestions JOIN QuestionScores ON SurveyQuestions.question_id = QuestionScores.question_id GROUP BY question_id;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM SurveyResponses GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_id IN (SELECT MAX(response_id) FROM SurveyResponses);
SELECT user_id, user_name FROM Users;
SELECT question_id, question_text FROM SurveyQuestions ORDER BY question_id DESC;
SELECT response_id, user_id, question_id, response_text, response_score FROM SurveyResponses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT question_id, AVG(average_score) AS average_score FROM QuestionScores GROUP BY question_id HAVING AVG(average_score) > 3;
SELECT response_id, response_text FROM SurveyResponses WHERE response_score < 2.5 ORDER BY response_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT question_text FROM SurveyQuestions WHERE question_id = 10;
SELECT user_name, response_text, response_score FROM Users JOIN SurveyResponses ON Users.user_id = SurveyResponses.user_id WHERE response_score > 4.5;

SELECT Users.user_name, SurveyQuestions.question_text, MAX(QuestionScores.average_score) FROM Users JOIN SurveyResponses ON Users.user_id = SurveyResponses.user_id JOIN SurveyQuestions ON SurveyResponses.question_id = SurveyQuestions.question_id JOIN QuestionScores ON SurveyQuestions.question_id = QuestionScores.question_id GROUP BY Users.user_name, SurveyQuestions.question_text;
SELECT user_name, COUNT(response_id) as total_responses FROM Users JOIN SurveyResponses ON Users.user_id = SurveyResponses.user_id GROUP BY user_name ORDER BY total_responses DESC;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE response_id = 1;
SELECT response_id, question_id, user_id FROM survey_responses WHERE response_value > 3;
SELECT survey_id, survey_name FROM surveys;
SELECT user_name, user_id FROM users ORDER BY user_name DESC;
SELECT question_text FROM questions WHERE question_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM survey_responses WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT question_text, response_value FROM survey_responses JOIN questions ON survey_responses.question_id = questions.question_id;
SELECT user_name, response_value FROM survey_responses JOIN users ON survey_responses.user_id = users.user_id;
SELECT survey_name, COUNT(response_id) AS total_responses FROM survey_responses JOIN surveys ON response_id = survey_id GROUP BY survey_name;

SELECT question_text, AVG(response_value) AS average_response FROM survey_responses JOIN questions ON survey_responses.question_id = questions.question_id GROUP BY question_text ORDER BY average_response DESC;
